General.Name: IGas Energy plc
General.Description: Star Energy Group Plc operates as an oil and gas development, exploration, processing, and production company in the United Kingdom. The company holds interests in the 50 licenses at onshore locations in the Weald Basin in the southern England; the Gainsborough Trough in the East Midlands; the Bowland Basin in the North West of England; and the Inner Moray Firth in Scotland. It also generates electricity. The company was formerly known as IGas Energy plc and changed its name to Star Energy Group Plc in June 2023. Star Energy Group Plc was founded in 2003 and is based in Lincoln, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Welton Gathering Centre, Lincoln, United Kingdom, LN2 2QX
